events.name: Αλγο at Mitsubishi Electronics!
events.shortDescription: Algo at Mitshubishi! On May 22, 2024. courtesy of Mitsubishi Electronics, members of our science club attended a presentation of the company's latest solutions.
events.longDescription: During the presentation we got familiar with the programs: Iconics - Advanced SCADA and visualization environment for industrial processes. Mailab - Innovative machine learning solutions for industrial applications. Vixio - Image recognition software that opens up new possibilities in automation. It was an extremely interesting and developing experience that gave us a picture of what the industry of the future might look like. Many thanks to Mitsubishi Electronics for their hospitality and fascinating presentation!
